title: Thy Life Was Giv'n For Me
presentation: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

v1: Thy life was giv'n for me,
Thy blood, O Lord, was shed,
Thy Life was given for me, for me;
What have I given for Thee?
v2: Long years were spent for me
Long years were spent for me, for me;
Have I spent one for Thee?
v3: Yea, all was left for me, for me;
Have I left aught for Thee?
v4: Thou, Lord, hast borne for me
More than my tongue can tell
Thou suff'redst all for me, for me;
What have I borne for Thee?
v5: And Thou hast brought to me
Great gifts, great gifts Thou broughtest me;
What have I brought to Thee?
v6: Oh, let my life be given,
My years for Thee be spent;
Thou gav'st Thyself for me, for me,
